flows.title: Quick Service Inquiry
flows.description: A sales manager who quickly identifies a need for lead generation automation and wants to initiate contact or learn more immediately.
browser_actions: Click the 'Get started' call-to-action button prominently displayed on the homepage.

flows.title: Customer Success and Case Study Review
flows.description: A sales operations lead or executive performing due diligence, seeking validation of Bluebirds' effectiveness through customer testimonials and case studies.
user_goals: Find proof points and success stories from existing customers
Understand the impact of Bluebirds on other businesses
browser_actions: Click 'Our Customers' link in the main navigation bar.
On the 'Customers' page, click the 'Read case study' button associated with 'InterSystems'.

flows.title: Company Background and Acquisition News Research
flows.description: A potential partner, investor, or a curious professional looking into the company's recent developments, funding, and strategic moves like the Salesforce acquisition.
user_goals: Understand the company's history and growth (e.g., funding rounds)
Learn more about the Salesforce acquisition and its implications
browser_actions: Click 'Blog' link in the main navigation bar.
Read the blog post titled 'Bluebirds Raises $5M Seed Round Led by Lightspeed to fix outbound sales'.
Click the 'Learn more' link next to the 'Bluebirds is now part of Salesforce!' announcement.

flows.title: Legal and Compliance Review
flows.description: An IT, legal, or procurement professional evaluating Bluebirds for compliance with data privacy, terms of service, and security standards before a potential partnership or purchase.
user_goals: Review Privacy Policy for data handling practices
Understand Terms & Conditions for service usage
Check security and compliance certifications (e.g., Trust Center)
browser_actions: Scroll to the footer section of the page.
Scroll to the footer section of the page.
Scroll to the footer section of the page.

flows.title: Returning User Login
flows.description: An existing Bluebirds customer who needs to log into their account to use the service or manage their settings.
browser_actions: Click the 'Log in' link in the top right corner of the navigation bar.
